statement.name: GetChecks
statement.sql: SELECT check_eft_issued_date as issue_date, vendor_name, agency_name, check_amount, expenditure_object_name as expense_category, agency_id, vendor_id, expenditure_object_id, department_name FROM disbursement_line_item_details

statement.name: GetAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT a.agency_id, b.agency_name, SUM(total_spending_amount) as check_amount FROM aggregateon_mwbe_spending_coa_entities a JOIN ref_agency b ON b.agency_id = a.agency_id
GROUP BY a.agency_id,b.agency_name

statement.name: GetExpenseCategories
statement.sql: SELECT expenditure_object_id as expense_category_id, expenditure_object_name as expense_category_name, check_amount FROM disbursement_line_item_details

statement.name: GetPrimeVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.vendor_id, b.legal_name as prime_vendor_name, mwbe_category, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) as check_amount, MAX(COALESCE(total_contract_amount,0)) as total_contract_amount FROM aggregateon_mwbe_spending_contract a JOIN vendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.vendor_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT minority_type_id, CASE WHEN minority_type_id IN (4,5) THEN 'Asian American' ELSE minority_type_name END as mwbe_category FROM ref_minority_type ) minority_type on minority_type.minority_type_id = a.minority_type_id
GROUP BY a.vendor_id, b.legal_name, mwbe_category

statement.name: GetSubVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.vendor_id, b.legal_name as sub_vendor_name, mwbe_category, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount, SUM(COALESCE(total_contract_amount,0)) AS total_sub_contract_amount, SUM(total_sub_contracts) AS number_sub_contracts, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS ytd_spending FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_vendor a JOIN subvendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.vendor_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT minority_type_id, CASE WHEN minority_type_id IN (4,5) THEN 'Asian American' ELSE minority_type_name END as mwbe_category FROM ref_minority_type ) minority_type on minority_type.minority_type_id = a.minority_type_id
'Y'
GROUP BY a.vendor_id, b.legal_name, mwbe_category

statement.name: GetContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT a.document_id as contract_number, a.description as contract_purpose, b.agency_name, c.legal_name as prime_vendor_name, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount, MAX(COALESCE(total_contract_amount,0)) AS total_contract_amount FROM aggregateon_mwbe_spending_contract a JOIN ref_agency b ON b.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor c ON c.vendor_id = a.vendor_id
GROUP BY a.document_id, a.description, b.agency_name, c.legal_name

statement.name: GetSpendingByIndustries
statement.sql:
SELECT a.industry_type_id, b.industry_type_name, SUM(total_spending_amount) as check_amount FROM aggregateon_mwbe_spending_coa_entities a JOIN ref_industry_type b ON b.industry_type_id = a.industry_type_id
GROUP BY a.industry_type_id,b.industry_type_name
